description: T1 Yew on rear right hand boundary - Reduce overall canopy by up to 1m and shape accordingly.G1 Pine x 5 (Group of 5 trees in front garden) - Reduce the overall height by up to 0.5m and reduce a selection of lateral branches by up to 1.5m on the property side to ensure clearance from roof. Remove major deadwood throughout the canopy.G2 Ash & Sycamore on rear left hand boundary (Group of 5 trees 4 self seeded Ash and 1 Sycamore) - Section fell as close to ground level as possible and poison stumps with appropriate herbicide.T2 Lawson Cypress on the right hand side of rear boundary - Section fell as close to ground level as possible.  T3 Holm Oak on rear right hand boundary - Section fell as close to ground level as possible and poison stump with appropriate use of herbicide (eco plugs) to prevent regrowth.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
